description: From Ottoman in the early 19th century; so named because reclining on a couch was associated with Middle Eastern customs.

entries.meaning: (furniture) An upholstered sofa, without arms or a back, sometimes with a compartment for storing linen etc.
(furniture) A low stool or thick cushion used to rest the feet or as a seat.
examples: Synonyms: footstool, hassock, pouffe, tuffet, tumpty

entries.meaning: (textiles) A fabric with a pronounced ribbed or corded effect, often made of silk or a mixture of cotton and silk-like yarns.
